LanguageData.BC_FixedMassCapacity_Tip: If actived this option, the mass capacity will fixed with a number you chosed.
LanguageData.BC_MassCapacityBase_Tip: All of pawns mass capacity will be [bodysize * base mass capacity]. The vanilla value is 35.
LanguageData.BC_MassCapacityFactor_Tip: The practical mass capacity of pawns will be [carrying capacity * mass capacity factor]kg. The default value is 0.5 .
